verses.kjv: The word which came unto Jeremiah from the LORD in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, saying,
verses.ct: This is the message that came to Jeremiah from the LORD during the reign of Jehoiakim son of Josiah, king of Judah:

verses.kjv: Go unto the house of the Rechabites, and speak unto them, and bring them into the house of the LORD, into one of the chambers, and give them wine to drink.
verses.ct: "Go to the Rechabite family, talk with them, and bring them into the LORD's temple — into one of the side rooms — and offer them wine to drink."

verses.kjv: Then I took Jaazaniah the son of Jeremiah, the son of Habaziniah, and his brethren, and all his sons, and the whole house of the Rechabites;
verses.ct: So I gathered Jaazaniah son of Jeremiah, son of Habaziniah, along with his brothers, all his sons, and the entire Rechabite family.

verses.kjv: And I brought them into the house of the LORD, into the chamber of the sons of Hanan, the son of Igdaliah, a man of God, which was by the chamber of the princes, which was above the chamber of Maaseiah the son of Shallum, the keeper of the door:
verses.ct: I brought them into the LORD's temple, into the room belonging to the sons of Hanan son of Igdaliah, a man of God. This room was next to the room of the officials and above the room of Maaseiah son of Shallum, the doorkeeper.

verses.kjv: And I set before the sons of the house of the Rechabites pots full of wine, and cups, and I said unto them, Drink ye wine.
verses.ct: Then I placed pitchers full of wine and cups in front of the members of the Rechabite family and told them, "Please, have some wine."

verses.kjv: But they said, We will drink no wine: for Jonadab the son of Rechab our father commanded us, saying, Ye shall drink no wine, neither ye, nor your sons for ever:
verses.ct: But they replied, "We don't drink wine. Our ancestor Jonadab son of Rechab gave us this command: 'You and your descendants must never drink wine.

verses.kjv: Neither shall ye build house, nor sow seed, nor plant vineyard, nor have any: but all your days ye shall dwell in tents; that ye may live many days in the land where ye be strangers.
verses.ct: You must also never build houses, plant crops, or cultivate vineyards. You must not own any of these things. Instead, you must live in tents your entire lives, so that you will live long in the land where you are outsiders.'

verses.kjv: Thus have we obeyed the voice of Jonadab the son of Rechab our father in all that he hath charged us, to drink no wine all our days, we, our wives, our sons, nor our daughters;
verses.ct: We have followed everything that our ancestor Jonadab son of Rechab instructed us to do. None of us has ever drunk wine — not us, not our wives, not our sons, and not our daughters.

verses.kjv: Nor to build houses for us to dwell in: neither have we vineyard, nor field, nor seed:
verses.ct: We have never built houses to live in, and we own no vineyards, no fields, and no crops.

verses.kjv: But we have dwelt in tents, and have obeyed, and done according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.
verses.ct: We have lived in tents and have been obedient, doing everything our ancestor Jonadab commanded us.

verses.kjv: But it came to pass, when Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came up into the land, that we said, Come, and let us go to Jerusalem for fear of the army of the Chaldeans, and for fear of the army of the Syrians: so we dwell at Jerusalem.
verses.ct: But when Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon invaded the land, we said, 'Let's go take shelter in Jerusalem to escape the Babylonian army and the Syrian army.' That's why we are now living in Jerusalem."

verses.kjv: Then came the word of the LORD unto Jeremiah, saying,
verses.ct: Then the LORD gave this message to Jeremiah:

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Go and tell the men of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem, Will ye not receive instruction to hearken to my words? saith the LORD.
verses.ct: "This is what the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, says: Go tell the people of Judah and the residents of Jerusalem, 'Won't you ever learn your lesson and listen to what I say?' declares the LORD.

verses.kjv: The words of Jonadab the son of Rechab, that he commanded his sons not to drink wine, are performed; for unto this day they drink none, but obey their father’s commandment: notwithstanding I have spoken unto you, rising early and speaking; but ye hearkened not unto me.
verses.ct: "The instructions of Jonadab son of Rechab have been carried out — he told his descendants not to drink wine, and to this day they have not drunk any, because they obey their ancestor's command. But I have spoken to you again and again, and you have refused to listen to me.

verses.kjv: I have sent also unto you all my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them, saying, Return ye now every man from his evil way, and amend your doings, and go not after other gods to serve them, and ye shall dwell in the land which I have given to you and to your fathers: but ye have not inclined your ear, nor hearkened unto me.
verses.ct: I sent all my servants the prophets to you, time after time, saying, 'Each of you must turn away from your wicked behavior. Change your actions. Stop chasing after other gods and worshiping them. Then you will continue to live in the land I gave to you and your ancestors.' But you paid no attention and refused to listen to me.

verses.kjv: Because the sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have performed the commandment of their father, which he commanded them; but this people hath not hearkened unto me:
verses.ct: The descendants of Jonadab son of Rechab have faithfully kept the command their ancestor gave them, but this nation has not listened to me.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the LORD God of hosts, the God of Israel; Behold, I will bring upon Judah and upon all the inhabitants of Jerusalem all the evil that I have pronounced against them: because I have spoken unto them, but they have not heard; and I have called unto them, but they have not answered.
verses.ct: So this is what the LORD God of hosts, the God of Israel, says: Pay attention — I am going to bring on Judah and on all the residents of Jerusalem every disaster I have warned them about, because I spoke to them but they did not listen, and I called out to them but they did not respond."

verses.kjv: And Jeremiah said unto the house of the Rechabites, Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Because ye have obeyed the commandment of Jonadab your father, and kept all his precepts, and done according unto all that he hath commanded you:
verses.ct: Then Jeremiah said to the Rechabite family, "This is what the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, says: Because you have obeyed the command of your ancestor Jonadab, followed all his instructions, and done everything he told you to do,

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Jonadab the son of Rechab shall not want a man to stand before me for ever.
verses.ct: this is what the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, declares: Jonadab son of Rechab will always have descendants who serve in my presence."
